website_summaries.verdict: A quality seat gap organizer with enough room for phones, wallets, sunglasses, etc. Neat packaging and attractive design make this a gift-worthy option.
pros: Slim base fits narrow seat gaps
Comes with Velcro strips to help keep it in place
Attractive finishes and nice packaging make these organizers ideal for gifting
cons: The fit might not be perfect if your console is lower than your seats

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  fit for a Subaru Outback
customer_reviews.text: No Velcro or adjustments needed. These slip right into place in the small gap between the seat and console, and they STAY PUT!! Exactly what I needed. For nearly 2 years I have struggled with where to put items that I was so accustomed to having handy in my old Explorer. In the Subaru access to the console is located under my elbow and is a struggle to open. The glove box is totally unreachable. These holders work for a book, call phone, hand cream or sanitizer, a small box of tissues, gloves. LOVE them!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana M Mercier

customer_reviews.title: very handy gap filler
customer_reviews.text: This gap filler/organizer solved one of my biggest problem. My phone tends to slip out of the pocket and falls into the seat gap if I'm wearing shorts. Sometimes it could be almost impossible to reach for it while driving. This gap filler fits between the gap perfectly. It doesn't take any space of the seating side so it doesn't decrease sitting comfort. now I can easily put my phone and handy tools inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amoosa

customer_reviews.title: works ok
customer_reviews.text: Worth having, but not quite as great usage as seen in ads. Quality of construction is good. Over priced but that might have been late Christmas shopping and short supply. Driver side could interfere with the emergency brake, but we never use it.. By the way... adhesion was not necessary... 2014 Ford Escort.Tight fit but ok. Comes out at times.. seat movement, etc. The Ford has too few usable "pockets" for stuff, so this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Middle Road

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be to big for my car but i was pleasantly surprised and how perfectly they fit. We needed the extra storage bc the inside of the car doest offer a lot of extra room especially on a long road trip X 2 ppl. These pockets allowed each of us to use them for our phones, lip balm, eye glass cleaners, extra charging cables, they really do help keep everything tidy and at the ready. I love them!! -- for reference my car is a 2017 Dodge Charger.
customer_reviews.author: Janice B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fits snug.
customer_reviews.text: Very simple yet great. Even though my truck has a decent amount of storage compartments, these are perfect for my phone, Bluetooth headset and knife.
customer_reviews.author: Lando

customer_reviews.title: Good product to organize vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product to organize your car. You put it on the side of your seat and can use that space now to finally store stuff. I personally use it to store my paperwork or coins that would usually be all over my car.
customer_reviews.author: Harish bhalla

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: These do exactly what they are supposed to do, they sit in between the edge of the seat and the manufacturer's installed console - they will hold my phone (so, I no longer need to slide the phone under my leg), a tin pf Altoids, and a chap stick. These have freed up the beverage holder for, well, beverages :) I do have to slide it forward a bit to put on my seatbelt, but that's not an issue. Overall, I like them a lot and would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Holds keys, shades, cologne, pens, smokes, what have you - stuff that always ended up sliding onto the floor once someone needed to use my drink holders. Any larger & they would have blocked my seatbelts. These are perfect for my 2005 Lexus. Liner for the bottom helps keep clean & little tabs hold in place.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R Kurzenberger

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm so much more satisfied with this product in comparison with the soft material version that mildewed straight out of the box. Prevents my cell phone and keys, etc from falling under my car seat and it's useful for holding mail.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dean

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m Completely Happy with this items, it Stays in Place, Perfect Size, I have Brought other Brands Before and this Are The Only Ones I really Love😀
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: I'm plesantly surprised! :O
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for storing wallets and CD's! The size is decent. I honestly thought that these would be smaller, but seeing it in actual, I'm pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Pringles

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. Instead of for my car- I bought for my sectional. Works great. Perfect for my Yeti. Holds my phone and remote. Great quality. Can also use in my car if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathydem

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the hooks even though it did say it is included in package. And the overall size is smaller then I expected. I bought this item according to one website best rated product. Product by itself is good,just,like I said it's smaller then I thought it would be and package wasn't complete.
customer_reviews.author: marioviski

customer_reviews.title: nice fit
customer_reviews.text: They were purchased for a gift. The person liked them very much. Perfect fit for the car.
customer_reviews.author: Robin R. Morales

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Fits in out JL Rubicon perfect. Matches the red and black interior perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Juwu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Used in two different cars and works great! Very sturdy and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Licata

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Installed ok on passenger side but could not use on driver side because interfered with parking brake.
customer_reviews.author: donnagreen

customer_reviews.title: Starbucks cups don’t fit as well.
customer_reviews.text: They wrapped it with material that makes it more difficult to put Starbucks cups in it.
customer_reviews.author: Space Cadet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these today and I Love Them!!! They are a nice quality and just enough extra storage. Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: george baker III

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have a Subaru Forester so I don’t have a ton of room these are helpful for extra space
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Barely fits normal cups, does NOT stay in place (in fact, I’m upset because it fell to the floor spilling a entire smoothie everywhere), and manages to block the seat belt buckle every time.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Phone Catchers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! These are not too big and/or gawdy like the others I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Willis

customer_reviews.title: useful and easy ti
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to organize your car and keep it clean
customer_reviews.author: Jan Mosoff

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great , fits the seat gap in my 2014 f150
customer_reviews.author: Jayson T Peabody

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, if you need it.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely fills the gap between seat and console on a Ford Escape (which has one of the worst console center designs ever). Its a little awkward at first but great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with this product but I thought it would be more useful. I can see that it simply can't be bigger or it would get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: gldsooner

customer_reviews.title: O.K. if you REALLY need the extra space - but---
customer_reviews.text: Only marginally good for a GMC Terrain. Makes seat belt clipping a pain, makes car feel even more crowded for space. Then again the Terrain is not all that big of a car.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Tomchay

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. Exactly what my car needed. SUV Kia Sportage. Yay, no more losing things between console and seat. Looks very nice in my new car. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Dana D

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: These are vey well made and do the trick. Only problem is keeping them in oplace, but the effort is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLE

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These work great in our van nice to be able to put phone somewhere safe
customer_reviews.author: Marie Feir

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Sturdy and perfect for what I need. I’m
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t need the adhesive because mine fit perfectly. I ordered one for a Christmas gift. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excelent!
customer_reviews.text: Such a practical and functional accessory for my car. It keeps everything organized in a stylish way. I love how it looks and it definitely complements my car interior. I’d definitely recommend this organizer to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Moises  Alberto Pineda Pelaez

customer_reviews.title: Looks as though they came with the car!
customer_reviews.text: Love them give me space to organize and not have to use my cup holders for any thing but cups. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Margo Breininger

customer_reviews.title: Great design and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product a WOW. Fit my seat perfect and it is very sturdy. I was blown away with the quality. It also came in a very sturdy gift box. No complaints and I intend to order more for gifts
customer_reviews.author: judy condry

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Little to bully for my liking . Not good for bigger people like men
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought 😒
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Pretty disappointed because its a little too close to the side of my leg while driving. Plus the cup holder is too small. Not everyone has small diameter bottles. Unless you use a lot of small bottles or cans, then its for you. Me personally not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found something better
customer_reviews.text: I found something better 3 months later. It has a cup holder with it. Also sold in a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hight quality. Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Perfect fit for my 2012 chevy tahoe. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: much neater and more organized car now....
customer_reviews.text: These pockets are so handy, and my car is now looking much neater and more organized. It fits well and for the price, the quality surprisingly very good.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Anne

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: These are much smaller than you'd imagine. You're going to have trouble fitting any modern cell phone unless you are a leprachaun.
customer_reviews.author: thirtyeyes

customer_reviews.title: Very handy !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool and easy way to organize things in the car !!!
customer_reviews.author: Derly Cassemiro

customer_reviews.title: I used both of mine on each seat.
customer_reviews.text: I love these things I have a small car with no room for small items you keep in the car
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G.

customer_reviews.title: The new ones fit great!
customer_reviews.text: I as very happy with the company working with me to get the ones that fit my car. All companies should be this responsible, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tommie M. Libecap

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and fills the space
customer_reviews.text: They fit my Nissan Sentra very well. Not too big for a mid-size car
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Seat Pockets
customer_reviews.text: I like the added compartment, however if someone else drives car and put seat back they don’t stay in place. I use them for my glasses and masks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall we like the organizer just fine and glad that we ordered them.
customer_reviews.text: The cup size could be a little bit bigger. Everything else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Goodfellow

customer_reviews.title: A better fitting and filling of spaceing product
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this product would of been a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Howell

customer_reviews.title: must have
customer_reviews.text: Love that I have more places to put my things in my truck!
customer_reviews.author: matt and kelly

customer_reviews.title: Look at size of drink holder.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit a large cup. Nice space for cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
